IX.i.2.4.
b
.
Where to Find Information On Administrative Determinations of Insanity
If there is a question as to whether a Veteran was insane at the time the act was committed that would otherwise be considered misconduct, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 2.A
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 2 - Original Pension Claims Development
citation: Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section None
